key.name: sound-icon-folder
key.description: Espeak does not currently support playing sound icons (audio files that are played by name when an application requests a sound icon). If you have installed the free(b)soft sound-icons package, this is the directory where will they be found. If not blank, the espeak Output Module will play them if it finds a file whose name matches the sound icon name. If blank, or no matching file is found, the name of the sound icon will be spoken.

key.name: sound-icon-volume
key.description: Volume at which sound icons are played.

key.name: punctuation-list
key.description: Characters to be spoken when punctuation setting is 'some' Encoding is UTF-8

key.name: capital-pitch-rise
key.description: This values gives the amount in Hz by which the pitch of a word raised to indicate it has a capital letter.

key.name: list-voice-variants
key.description: Controls whether espeak voice variants are presented in the list of available voices. A value of 1 will present an espeak voice, plus the espeak voice with all the available variants. A value of 0 will present the list of espeak voices only.

key.name: audio-chunk-size
key.description: Number of ms of audio returned by the espeak cal lback function.

key.name: audio-queue-max-size
key.description: Maximum number of samples to buffer in playback queue.

key.name: debug
key.description: Whether debugging is enabled in the espeak output module or not.
